title: Encouraging Different Gifts & Dreams
itunes:author: Guest: Shelia Erwin
itunes:summary:
Every child is uniquely designed by God with special talents. The key is in recognizing what your son or daughter is good at. John and Danny share how you can engage with your kid, even if your dreams and desires are very different from each other. Featuring Shelia Erwin.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/parentingpodcast, or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

Get Shelia's book "Raising Up Dreamers: Find and Grow Your Child’s God-Given Talents" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofp-podcast-2022-03-01?refcd=1324802

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-parenting-podcast/encouraging-different-gifts-dreams/#featured-resource-cta

Listen Anytime: https://store.focusonthefamily.com/dreaming-with-your-child-digital-download?refcd=1324802

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
